channel.title: Help me out please weird error!
channel.description:
ive been trying all day long to get my server connected so ppl can play it. ive tried every guide... im really in need of some help. I got the 317 client+source from pk planet. ive got DUC installed correct, using utorrent installed correct... port working.
Error people get when they try to connect is.
Youre IP banned wait 5minutes then try to relog.
A friend tried to connect with a hack client he got in it for 5 secs then got kicked ofcourse.
So i dont know what i did wrong i myself think i put some Ip's wrong if u know which or u know this problem please tell or explain.
Grtz. B

item.title: Help me out please weird error!
item.dc:creator: @young_pure42 young pure42
item.description:
@young_pure42 wrote:

Yup should be in server help.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me out please weird error!
